item.title: Anew Life
item.description: Several moments later, I keep thinking about how to recuperate from my hearth break. For example, I’m starting a new activity as a Game Streamer & Illustrator. Also I registered my personal info onto several website. Well, If I just sulk over this then my first love will actually be meaningless. “Now that you’ve get lost, get the courage” - Kaiji

item.title: Tragedy
item.description: My first love ended in a mere ten pages.. Today, my sister told me that my crush is going to stay for a while in our residence with a girl At first, I thought it was his sister since her name is the same as Nasa-kun But suddenly my Mom said it was her wife & Nasa-kun had been married several couple days ago And there is my another gloomy day after my first love ended tragically

item.title: Introduction
item.description: My name is Arisugawa Aya, 17 years old a high schooler student It was about 7 years ago, when I first learned about him. And it was during math class. There was a problem that nobody could solve. But he just solved it without lifting a finger “This guy must be smart”, I remember thinking that And then…
